dcb50b6b-8a08-4035-9444-ab3633b82c50.description: The Doctype is HTML5 and is at the top of all your HTML pages.

25fa6ead-8d28-4fb8-a589-6eb9e8b95744.title: Title
25fa6ead-8d28-4fb8-a589-6eb9e8b95744.description: A title is used on all pages (SEO: Google calculates the pixel width of the characters used in the title, and it cuts off between 472 and 482 pixels. The average character limit would be around 55-characters).

912682ab-298e-4064-a795-177ed125f37a.title: Description
912682ab-298e-4064-a795-177ed125f37a.description: A meta description is provided, it is unique and doesn't possess more than 150 characters.
html: <meta name="description" content="Description of the page less than 150 characters">

9bb3971b-d96f-4c0e-9529-392a4ca7fcf5.title: Favicons
9bb3971b-d96f-4c0e-9529-392a4ca7fcf5.description: Each favicon has been created and displays correctly. If you have only a `favicon.ico`, put it at the root of your site. Normally you won't need to use any markup. However, it's still good practice to link to it using the example below. Today, **PNG format is recommended** over `.ico` format (dimensions: 32x32px).

url.label: Favicons, Touch Icons, Tile Icons, etc. Which Do You Need? - CSS Tricks

cf5d7a22-7692-45a9-9b74-c485f40103d9.title: Direction attribute
cf5d7a22-7692-45a9-9b74-c485f40103d9.description: The direction of lecture is specified on the html tag (It can be used on another HTML tag).

a13a7752-afe1-4adb-aecf-81a88e7c8630.title: Alternate language
a13a7752-afe1-4adb-aecf-81a88e7c8630.description: The language tag of your website is specified and related to the language of the current page.

5a850543-2ece-4b7f-aa2d-1a897a126536.description: The language tag of your website for international landing pages.

15135bc4-b0bf-4b10-a71a-8ac1de8763ac.description: Conditional comments are present for IE if needed.

cadcf853-d4c6-4192-8b19-fd947cb84043.description: If your project is a blog or has articles, an RSS link was provided.

4e27e61d-94e7-4130-8b52-de6474d20609.title: CSS Critical
4e27e61d-94e7-4130-8b52-de6474d20609.description: The CSS critical (or "above the fold") collects all the CSS used to render the visible portion of the page. It is embedded before your principal CSS call and between `<style></style>` in a single line (minified).

url.label: Critical by Addy Osmani on GitHub

8a6f7e04-adba-4284-9d41-9e8857b1e336.title: CSS order
8a6f7e04-adba-4284-9d41-9e8857b1e336.description: All CSS files are loaded before any JavaScript files in the `<head>`. (Except the case where sometimes JS files are loaded asynchronously on top of your page).

debe92c6-6c20-4c64-8861-a0f5107717e9.description: All Facebook Open Graph (OG) are tested and no one is missing or with false information. Images need to be at least 600 x 315 pixels, although 1200 x 630 pixels is recommended.
html: <!-- Next tags are optional but recommended -->

url.label: A Guide to Sharing for Webmasters

f2d25284-1d76-4080-9771-2e3342dc7e39.title: Twitter Card

ed439516-e49b-422e-8ac2-78dbed54c061.description: HTML5 Semantic Elements are used appropriately (header, section, footer, main...).

93502d8e-a130-42ff-8c06-83d9b2e77db1.title: Error pages
93502d8e-a130-42ff-8c06-83d9b2e77db1.description: Error 404 page and 5xx exist. Remember that the 5xx error pages need to have their CSS integrated (no external call on the current server).

0d413558-4f36-458b-b612-9abe3af3be4f.title: Noopener
0d413558-4f36-458b-b612-9abe3af3be4f.description: In case you are using external links with `target="_blank"`, your link should have a `rel="noopener"` attribute to prevent tab nabbing. If you need to support older versions of Firefox, use `rel="noopener noreferrer"`.

8721e22f-b0ba-4efd-ac83-0745a29324c8.description: Unnecessary code needs to be removed before sending the page to production.

472ff5f2-055a-49c1-a128-149c0eebdfb7.title: W3C compliant
472ff5f2-055a-49c1-a128-149c0eebdfb7.description: All pages need to be tested with the W3C validator to identify possible issues in the HTML code.

1a14e62a-971e-4d06-9084-a43e8516a1eb.description: I use tools to help me analyze any issues I could have on my HTML code.

005894c5-9289-4dd7-917f-1f151728025b.title: Link checker
005894c5-9289-4dd7-917f-1f151728025b.description: There are no broken links in my page, verify that you don't have any 404 error.

6b3430fe-4762-4c2e-a15e-2cccb431a7b8.description: Your website shows your content correctly with adblockers enabled (You can provide a message encouraging people to disable their adblocker).

7254db87-a985-4cc2-917e-01cf981af45c.title: CSS Print
7254db87-a985-4cc2-917e-01cf981af45c.description: A print stylesheet is provided and is correct on each page.

35c778c9-ec58-40b6-9fe4-ac9c3d4d85f2.title: Preprocessors
35c778c9-ec58-40b6-9fe4-ac9c3d4d85f2.description: Your project is using a CSS preprocessor (e.g [Sass](http://sass-lang.com/), [Less](http://lesscss.org/), [Stylus](http://stylus-lang.com/)).

b1ca1a40-1684-4094-a80e-355eae1fccb2.title: Unique ID
b1ca1a40-1684-4094-a80e-355eae1fccb2.description: If IDs are used, they are unique to a page.

febb5b98-f2e7-4305-aea4-7271aa02d269.title: Reset CSS
febb5b98-f2e7-4305-aea4-7271aa02d269.description: A CSS reset (reset, normalize or reboot) is used and up to date. *(If you are using a CSS Framework like Bootstrap or Foundation, a Normalize is already included into it.)*

c45ac3c9-fa73-4be9-b997-07048863a433.title: JS prefix
c45ac3c9-fa73-4be9-b997-07048863a433.description: All classes (or id- used in JavaScript files) begin with **js-** and are not styled into the CSS files.

799073d1-eabf-43de-966f-4d41988bd5df.title: embedded or inline CSS
799073d1-eabf-43de-966f-4d41988bd5df.description: Avoid at all cost embedding CSS in `<style>` tags or using inline CSS: only use for valid reasons (e.g. background-image for slider, critical CSS).

ff22f904-85dd-44ec-8f0e-b4864403844a.title: Vendor prefixes
ff22f904-85dd-44ec-8f0e-b4864403844a.description: CSS vendor prefixes are used and are generated accordingly with your browser support compatibility.

be004725-0e8e-46d6-8810-d1491d114308.title: Minification
be004725-0e8e-46d6-8810-d1491d114308.description: JavaScript files are minified (you can add the `.min` suffix).

ffe8753d-c4da-484a-8424-748553626e93.title: Non-blocking
ffe8753d-c4da-484a-8424-748553626e93.description: JavaScript files are loaded asynchronously using `async` or deferred using `defer` attribute.

00487baa-d0e7-4f49-9a2a-e970f844ec1f.title: Stylelint
00487baa-d0e7-4f49-9a2a-e970f844ec1f.description: All CSS or SCSS files are without any errors.

f1781eff-0f5f-4f60-863a-99e6f392048d.title: Responsive web design
f1781eff-0f5f-4f60-863a-99e6f392048d.description: All pages were tested at the following breakpoints: 320px, 768px, 1024px (can be more / different according to your analytics).

url.label: Responsive Checker - Responsive Website Design Tester

9fe06fd8-3216-4f9d-a05b-d969e56008c0.title: CSS Validator
9fe06fd8-3216-4f9d-a05b-d969e56008c0.description: The CSS was tested and pertinent errors were corrected.

7a889c25-6e36-48ce-a7b7-99bd078d33a6.title: Desktop Browsers
7a889c25-6e36-48ce-a7b7-99bd078d33a6.description: All pages were tested on all current desktop browsers (Safari, Firefox, Chrome, Internet Explorer, EDGE...).

e1a00018-61d7-4908-ab8e-76da4136f75e.title: Mobile Browsers
e1a00018-61d7-4908-ab8e-76da4136f75e.description: All pages were tested on all current mobile browsers (Native browser, Chrome, Safari...).

b2d60d86-2f77-4cac-a5dc-3d93978dd3de.title: OS
b2d60d86-2f77-4cac-a5dc-3d93978dd3de.description: All pages were tested on all current OS (Windows, Android, iOS, Mac...).

d24499c9-8871-4572-a36c-a18de891b137.title: Design fidelity
d24499c9-8871-4572-a36c-a18de891b137.description: Depending on the project and the quality of the creatives, you may be asked to be close to the design. You can use some tools to compare creatives with your code implementation and ensure consistency.

6111280a-27dd-46eb-81cc-76ee8b233b40.title: Reading direction
6111280a-27dd-46eb-81cc-76ee8b233b40.description: All pages need to be tested for LTR and RTL languages if they need to be supported.

url.label: Building RTL-Aware Web Apps & Websites: Part 1 - Mozilla Hacks
Building RTL-Aware Web Apps & Websites: Part 2 - Mozilla Hacks

eacdd165-8795-4dfe-a477-c9142f05ed5b.title: Optimization
eacdd165-8795-4dfe-a477-c9142f05ed5b.description: All images are optimized to be rendered in the browser. WebP format could be used for critical pages (like Homepage).

url.label: ImageOptim
url.url: https://imageoptim.com/) to optimise your images for free.

url.label: KeyCDN Image Processing
url.url: https://www.keycdn.com/support/image-processing) for image optimization in real time.

url.label: Kraken.io
url.url: https://kraken.io/web-interface) awesome alternative for both png and jpg optimization. Up to 1mb per files on free plan.

url.label: TinyPNG
url.url: https://tinypng.com/) losslessly optimises png, apng (animated png) and jpg images. Free and paid version available.

url.label: ZorroSVG
url.url: http://quasimondo.com/ZorroSVG/) jpg-like compression for transparent images using svg masking.

url.label: SVGO
url.url: https://github.com/svg/svgo) a Nodejs-based tool for optimizing SVG vector graphics files.

url.label: SVGOMG
url.url: https://jakearchibald.github.io/svgomg/) a web-based GUI version of SVGO for optimising your svgs online.

f83ac2a3-61b2-469a-b25b-c8f297aeed36.title: Picture/Srcset
f83ac2a3-61b2-469a-b25b-c8f297aeed36.description: You use picture/srcset to provide the most appropriate image for the current viewport of the user.

url.label: How to Build Responsive Images with srcset

3d0236fb-25f4-4277-87b9-3685bd96ecdb.title: Retina
3d0236fb-25f4-4277-87b9-3685bd96ecdb.description: You provide layout images 2x or 3x, support retina display.

6e7fbd18-2008-4e12-8e57-44059f35049f.title: Sprite
6e7fbd18-2008-4e12-8e57-44059f35049f.description: Small images are in a sprite file (in the case of icons, they can be in an SVG sprite image).

178721ec-4be3-4b06-b00a-bf36ebcbbcda.title: Width and Height
178721ec-4be3-4b06-b00a-bf36ebcbbcda.description: Set `width` and `height` attributes on `` if the final rendered image size is known (can be omitted for CSS sizing).

773a3c2c-228b-47bc-9da4-1a64610cd3d2.title: Alternative text
773a3c2c-228b-47bc-9da4-1a64610cd3d2.description: All `` have an alternative text which describes the image visually.

9cf6b4e6-fc35-4afb-bd22-2ceb56336ec4.title: Lazy loading
9cf6b4e6-fc35-4afb-bd22-2ceb56336ec4.description: Images, scripts and CSS need to be lazy loaded to improve the response time of the current page (See details in their respective sections).

126d9455-e527-4dc4-a925-96ef8b59a201.title: JavaScript Inline
126d9455-e527-4dc4-a925-96ef8b59a201.description: You don't have any JavaScript code inline (mixed with your HTML code).

url.label: Guidelines for Developing Secure Applications Utilizing JavaScript

1ee555f8-72af-432f-a10e-23508f96b229.title: `noscript` tag
1ee555f8-72af-432f-a10e-23508f96b229.description: Use `
html: You need to enable JavaScript to run this app.

13570616-efb6-4a95-935b-293d75be9963.title: Optimized and updated JS libraries
13570616-efb6-4a95-935b-293d75be9963.description: All JavaScript libraries used in your project are necessary (prefer Vanilla Javascript for simple functionalities), updated to their latest version and don't overwhelm your JavaScript with unnecessary methods.

url.label: Vanilla JavaScript for building powerful web applications

d2905a05-166a-4592-9021-a3b514ab9e42.title: Modernizr
d2905a05-166a-4592-9021-a3b514ab9e42.description: If you need to target some specific features you can use a custom Modernizr to add classes in your `<html>` tag.

87ba604a-f1fe-4c70-b023-171402d418bb.title: ESLint
87ba604a-f1fe-4c70-b023-171402d418bb.description: No errors are flagged by ESLint (based on your configuration or standards rules).

url.label: ESLint - The pluggable linting utility for JavaScript and JSX

01ac67ed-ae13-45ff-af51-df3f9cf0ddf8.title: Scan and check your web site
01ac67ed-ae13-45ff-af51-df3f9cf0ddf8.description: HTTPS is used on every page and for all external content (plugins, images...).

9e850749-d18a-4ef8-9aea-b98515ce3585.title: HTTPS
9e850749-d18a-4ef8-9aea-b98515ce3585.description: HTTPS is used on every page and for all external content (plugins, images...).

1f6d067a-36f9-442c-b5ed-99f49734d664.title: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS)
1f6d067a-36f9-442c-b5ed-99f49734d664.description: The HTTP header is set to 'Strict-Transport-Security'.

url.label: Check HSTS preload status and eligibility
HTTP Strict Transport Security Cheat Sheet - OWASP
Transport Layer Protection Cheat Sheet - OWASP

bcb67a8d-853c-4dc5-8027-d67fcdde4636.title: Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF)
bcb67a8d-853c-4dc5-8027-d67fcdde4636.description: You ensure that requests made to your server-side are legitimate and originate from your website / app to prevent CSRF attacks.

url.label: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) Prevention Cheat Sheet  - OWASP

80acdc30-9fff-4232-b143-fec61147c95b.title: Cross Site Scripting (XSS)
80acdc30-9fff-4232-b143-fec61147c95b.description: Your page or website is free from XSS possible issues.

url.label: XSS (Cross Site Scripting) Prevention Cheat Sheet  - OWASP
DOM based XSS Prevention Cheat Sheet  - OWASP

413e5576-6d07-4629-8f0d-38b23bd62408.title: Content Type Options
413e5576-6d07-4629-8f0d-38b23bd62408.description: Prevents Google Chrome and Internet Explorer from trying to mime-sniff the content-type of a response away from the one being declared by the server.

b2fa7860-9746-49ed-816c-4de2873e805d.title: X-Frame-Options (XFO)
b2fa7860-9746-49ed-816c-4de2873e805d.description: Protects your visitors against clickjacking attacks.

382d321c-6985-4377-af0b-64c3022fbad1.title: Content Security Policy
382d321c-6985-4377-af0b-64c3022fbad1.description: Defines how content is loaded on your site and from where it is permitted to be loaded. Can also be used to protect against clickjacking attacks.

url.label: Content Security Policy - An Introduction - Scott Helme

2ae01191-5984-4043-8d21-f7ba5a0e68ff.title: Goals to achieve
html: Your pages should reach these goals:
- Time To Interactive under 5 seconds for the "average" configuration (a $200 Android on a slow 3G network with 400ms RTT and 400kbps transfer speed) and under 2 seconds for repeat visits

url.label: Size Limit: Make the Web lighter

0468788e-5280-4f42-88ea-521fbd4b524a.title: Cookie size
0468788e-5280-4f42-88ea-521fbd4b524a.description: If you are using cookies be sure each cookie doesn't exceed 4096 bytes and your domain name doesn't have more than 20 cookies.

852a8d7a-f488-4e3e-9cc7-da62cf6b4710.title: Third party components
852a8d7a-f488-4e3e-9cc7-da62cf6b4710.description: Third party iframes or components relying on external JS (like sharing buttons) are replaced by static components when possible, thus limiting calls to external APIs and keeping your user's activity private.

5788408e-e04d-4b6a-b5fe-fbc5fa0c4a95.title: DNS resolution
5788408e-e04d-4b6a-b5fe-fbc5fa0c4a95.description: DNS of third-party services that may be needed are resolved in advance during idle time using `dns-prefetch`.

ef551f5e-5f28-4c05-9ef6-34f5f7725e1c.title: Preconnection
ef551f5e-5f28-4c05-9ef6-34f5f7725e1c.description: DNS lookup, TCP handshake and TLS negotiation with services that will be needed soon is done in advance during idle time using `preconnect`.

8472f894-74dd-4498-ae50-b23966d29c65.title: Prefetching
8472f894-74dd-4498-ae50-b23966d29c65.description: Resources that will be needed soon (e.g. lazy loaded images) are requested in advance during idle time using `prefetch`.

f50a4487-4a0c-487b-82ca-0bcec5f6cc59.title: Preloading
f50a4487-4a0c-487b-82ca-0bcec5f6cc59.description: Resources needed in the current page (e.g. scripts placed at the end of `<body>`) in advance using `preload`.

d39f56ce-30a1-4dbe-874a-d6318a3337aa.title: Google PageSpeed
d39f56ce-30a1-4dbe-874a-d6318a3337aa.description: All your pages were tested (not only the homepage) and have a score of at least 90/100.

url.label: Test your mobile speed with Google
WebPagetest - Website Performance and Optimization Test
GTmetrix - Website speed and performance optimization
Speedrank - Improve the performance of your website

f39ca44e-768c-422a-960c-ecd7b5d88aa2.title: Progressive enhancement
f39ca44e-768c-422a-960c-ecd7b5d88aa2.description: Major functionality like main navigation and search should work without JavaScript enabled.

url.label: Enable / Disable JavaScript in Chrome Developer Tools

d03b4f70-b36f-4109-ae00-8229f98f0087.title: Color contrast
d03b4f70-b36f-4109-ae00-8229f98f0087.description: Color contrast should at least pass WCAG AA (AAA for mobile).

12fa8e0c-0e81-4648-a8c0-8fbb06b3be82.title: H1
12fa8e0c-0e81-4648-a8c0-8fbb06b3be82.description: All pages have an H1 which is not the title of the website.

aa0eda68-b908-4237-9827-33224fdb6875.title: Headings
aa0eda68-b908-4237-9827-33224fdb6875.description: Headings should be used properly and in the right order (H1 to H6).

url.label: Why headings and landmarks are so important -- A11ycasts #18

13ad3518-1cbb-4b65-968f-9cfba37a0ad6.title: Specific HTML5 input types are used
13ad3518-1cbb-4b65-968f-9cfba37a0ad6.description: This is especially important for mobile devices that show customized keypads and widgets for different types.

2aae1237-8b36-43f5-9635-5444625377b1.title: Label
2aae1237-8b36-43f5-9635-5444625377b1.description: A label is associated with each input form element. In case a label can't be displayed, use `aria-label` instead.

4d9510a8-5b42-4ebe-ad30-ec867e24cad7.title: Accessibility standards testing
4d9510a8-5b42-4ebe-ad30-ec867e24cad7.description: Use the WAVE tool to test if your page respects the accessibility standards.

b9b6ff61-2d63-4034-8458-2312480a9d3c.title: Keyboard navigation
b9b6ff61-2d63-4034-8458-2312480a9d3c.description: Test your website using only your keyboard in a previsible order. All interactive elements are reachable and usable.

f443150b-bd2e-407f-8d04-3d6f1b2a1d81.title: Screen-reader
f443150b-bd2e-407f-8d04-3d6f1b2a1d81.description: All pages were tested in a screen-reader (VoiceOver, ChromeVox, NVDA or Lynx).

95073182-10ad-458c-ab88-900153f4858a.title: Focus style
95073182-10ad-458c-ab88-900153f4858a.description: If the focus is disabled, it is replaced by visible state in CSS.

401669bd-e811-450d-aa45-e4b5b81829ea.title: Google Analytics
401669bd-e811-450d-aa45-e4b5b81829ea.description: Google Analytics is installed and correctly configured.

896fdb92-0a9e-40d0-8809-bf2eb4031eb1.title: Search Console
896fdb92-0a9e-40d0-8809-bf2eb4031eb1.description: Search Console is installed and correctly configured. It is a free service offered by Google that helps you monitor, maintain, and troubleshoot your site's presence in Google Search results.

599f66b9-7f0c-409b-b425-82fa2bc91171.title: Headings logic
